response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and exceptional quality, I understand its worth to you stands at $12,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at $11,000, aiming to create a mutually beneficial transaction.
